name: Frostallion

aura.name: ice_steed
aura.description: Can be ridden as a flying mount. Changes the player's attack type to Ice and enhances Ice attacks while mounted.

description: Guardian deity of Palpagos Island, known as the Winter Caller. In the past, when a calamity struck the land, it soared into the sky and sealed away the threat by casting the island into an eternal winter.

skills.name: air_cannon
skills.description: Quickly fires a burst of highly pressurized air.

skills.name: ice_missile
skills.description: Creates ice lances in the air that fly towards enemies.

skills.name: icicle_cutter
skills.description: Creates a crescent blade of ice and hurls it forward.

skills.name: iceberg
skills.description: Summons a sharp ice lance under an enemy.

skills.name: crystal_wing
skills.description: Frostallion's exclusive skill. Dashes forward while creating frigid air around its wings, using them to slash enemies.

skills.name: cryst_breath
skills.description: Enshrouds an enemy in a frigid blast of air, dealing continuous damage.

skills.name: blizzard_spike
skills.description: Creates a giant lump of ice and hurls it at an enemy. It deals damage to those in the surrounding area upon impact.
